verses.verse: If one be found <WH4672> slain <WH2491> in the land <WH127> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee to possess <WH3423> it <WH5307>, lying in the field <WH7704>, and it be not known <WH3045> who hath smitten him <WH5221>;
